item.title: Josh O’Connor Plans an Art Heist in ‘The Mastermind’ Trailer
item.description: The Kelly Reichardt-written and -directed film also stars Alana Haim, Gaby Hoffman, John Magaro, Hope Davis and Bill Camp.

item.title: HBO Max Shares First Footage From ‘The Pitt’ Season 2: “And So It Begins”
item.description: The teaser for the upcoming, in-production episodes, premiering in January, confirms the return of Katherine LaNasa’s charge nurse Dana and Patrick Ball’s Dr. Langdon.

item.title: HBO Max Shares First Footage From ‘The Pitt’ Season 2: “And So It Begins”
item.description: The teaser for the upcoming, in-production episodes, premiering in January, confirms the return of Katherine LaNasa’s charge nurse Dana and Patrick Ball’s Dr. Langdon.

item.title: Dylan O’Brien, Diane Lane Spar Over His Girlfriend in Trailer for ‘Anniversary’
item.description: Kyle Chandler and Phoebe Dynevor also star in Jan Komasa’s thriller that hits theaters this fall.

item.title: Colin Farrell Risks It All in Wild Trailer for Edward Berger’s Netflix Movie ‘Ballad of a Small Player’
item.description: Fala Chen and Tilda Swinton also star in the feature that premieres at TIFF and adapts Lawrence Osborne’s 2014 novel.

item.title: ‘Good Boy’ Trailer Shows Haunted House From Dog’s Perspective
item.description: Ben Leonberg’s feature debut hits theaters on Oct. 3 after premiering at the 2025 SXSW Film Festival.

item.title: ‘The Diplomat’ Sets Season 3 Release Date as Latest Teaser Sees Keri Russell Warn of “Terribly Flawed” New POTUS
item.description: Netflix offers more of a glimpse into the next episodes of the political thriller, which has added Bradley Whitford as the husband of Allison Janney’s Grace Penn.

item.title: ‘The Diplomat’ Sets Season 3 Release Date as Latest Teaser Sees Keri Russell Warn of “Terribly Flawed” New POTUS
item.description: Netflix offers more of a glimpse into the next episodes of the political thriller, which has added Bradley Whitford as the husband of Allison Janney’s Grace Penn.

item.title: Timothée Chalamet Introduces Gwyneth Paltrow to High-Stakes Ping-Pong in ‘Marty Supreme’ Trailer
item.description: Tyler, the Creator and Fran Drescher also star in Josh Safdie’s feature that hits theaters later this year from A24.

item.title: Joel Edgerton, William H. Macy Confront a Rapidly Changing America in ‘Train Dreams’ Teaser Trailer
item.description: Felicity Jones and Kerry Condon also star in the period movie about a Pacific Northwest logger and rail worker set to hit Netflix on Nov. 21 after a short theatrical run.

item.title: Jeff Buckley Wants To Be Remembered for “Just The Music” in Late Singer’s ‘It’s Never Over’ Doc Trailer
item.description: The film, directed by Amy Berg, will hit theaters Aug. 8.
